channel.title: My Blog
channel.description: Welcome to My Blog - where you can find all the latest updates!

item.title: Post 1: Introduction to My Blog
item.description: This is the first post on my blog, introducing what topics I'll cover and what readers can expect.
item.dc:creator: Max Mustermann

item.title: Post 2: Tips for Writing Great Blog Posts
item.description: In this post, I share some tips and best practices for writing engaging and informative blog posts.
item.dc:creator: Max Mustermann
